scene_metadata.title: The Quiet Knower
scene_metadata.philosophical_depth: the still small voice beneath anxiety

dialogue.text: The ego—the teenager—is smart, anxious, always ready to steer the wheel. But this other part of you, the knower, wants something quieter.

visual_elements.environment: studio as container for deep reflection

psychological_notes: The Architect distinguishes between the anxious ego (smart but reactive) and the deeper knower (wise but quiet). This maps the internal conflict between control and surrender, noise and silence.
philosophical_underpinning: Wisdom speaks in whispers while anxiety shouts; the knower waits beneath the teenager's chatter
therapeutic_direction: Learning to distinguish and honor the quiet wisdom beneath ego's constant steering
